details.arabic_diacless: لئن انجيتـنا من هٰذهٖ لنكونن من الشٰكرين‏
details.arabic: لَئِنْ اَنۡجَيۡتَـنَا مِنۡ هٰذِهٖ لَنَكُوۡنَنَّ مِنَ الشّٰكِرِيۡنَ‏
details.transliteration: la-in anjaytana min hathihi lanakoonanna mina ashshakireen
details.translations: "If You should save us from this, we will surely be among the thankful."
